data.message: Great Idea FB!!! Thanks!!  :-) But where & how do I sign up for this???

replies.message: Hey Cathy. No need to sign up for Safety Check. If you are in the affected area, you will get a Facebook notification, see an alert at the top of your News Feed and receive an SMS from Facebook about Safety Check . Learn more about Safety Check here: https://www.facebook.com/about/safetycheck/ . -Hailey

Hi, I got banned : Hi I got banned for nothing : We've detected suspicious activity on your account on Facebook and ZE temporarily for security reasons we blocked them . Probably , your account has been exposed to danger as a result of entering a password on the Site designed so THAT look as Facebook . This type of attack known as a joke extortion (phishing ) . Find Out More Help Center . In the next few steps will present safety tests , Who will help protect your account and will re -up sign . FACEBOOK PLZ I NEED HELP
This is a bogus teaser to get you to on their list..... It's a sham.  There likely will be no internet connectivity in a real disaster scenario
